resources.string: Please place the device at the distance of 30-50 cm from your face. Direct your gaze (eyes) to the centre of the screen and keep your head in a natural position. Your head should be pointed to the centre of the screen. Use the window below to check your head\'s position.
Device position:
OK
Fail
Device jolting:
Ambient lighting:
Camera illumination:
Head detection:
Distance:
Eye detection:
Start test
Please look at the centre of the screen
Stop test
Wrong device position! Please place the device on a flat and stable surface.
Device is not stable. The device must be placed on a flat surface and shouldn\'t be moved during the test.
Insufficient ambient lighting! Please change your position or improve ambient lighting.
There is too much light pointed at the camera. Please change your position or adjust ambient lighting.
Cannot detect the face. Please sit closer or check ambient lighting.
The face is too far from the screen. Please place the device at a distance 30-50 cm from your face.
The face is too close to the screen. Please place the device at a distance 30 - 50 cm from your face.
Cannot detect eye. Please sit closer or check ambient lighting.
Calibration was not successful. Please do not move your head and try again.
